title: Add configurable data retention policies for ingested customer signals

sections.text: Implement per-workspace retention settings to automatically expire and delete stored customer signals (e.g., CRM fields, surveys, usage events, support tickets, notes) after a configurable period. Apply deletions to primary storage and search/index layers, with clear defaults that preserve current behavior if unset. Expose an admin-only API/config surface and record retention configuration changes for audit purposes.
